mapper.insert: insert into sys_config (id, key, value, is_delete, created_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
